00131 template<class DecorationT>
00132 inline DecorationT* getPointType(Point3D* queryPoint) {
00133         if (dynamic_cast<DecorationT*>(queryPoint) != 0) {
00134                 return dynamic_cast<DecorationT*>(queryPoint); //found
00135         } else if (dynamic_cast<Point3DDecorator*>(queryPoint) != 0) {
00136                 return getPointType<DecorationT>( dynamic_cast<Point3DDecorator*>(queryPoint)->getPoint() ); //feed forward
00137         } else {
00138                 return 0; //not found
00139         }
00140 };
00141 
00142 }
